overview: Once his mom is out for the day, Tony - lead vocalist of queer glam rock band Tony and the Kiki- takes advantage of their long awaited privacy and lets all his dirty secrets sift to the surface. Seductive and unapologetically sparkly, "DIRTY SECRETS" will take you on a musical journey where we unfurl a taboo tapestry of Tony's kinks.
title: Dirty Secrets - Tony & the Kiki
